short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash the potential of Gen AI while staying in line with GDPR and other data protection regulations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embank AI is a tool to help protect your personal data while supercharging your use of ChatGPT. It can be considered a simple-to-use Data Leak Prevention system for ChatGPT. It supports most languages and does not collect any data.

Embank AI will prevent you from accidentally sharing sensitive data when copying and pasting content into ChatGPT, such as telephone numbers, bank account details, credit cards, email addresses, VAT numbers, addresses, and much more... 

Embank AI will help you remain compliant with data protection regulations such as GDPR, CCPD, and others.
